com.estimote.mgmtsdk.feature.mesh

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.mgmtsdk.feature.mesh.Mesh

  • public class Mesh
extends java.lang.Object
    General object for mesh management. Use this to add/remove devices from mesh and to configure mesh settings.
    Author:
    Pawel Dylag (pawel.dylag@estimote.com)

                      DeviceConnection connection,
                      MeshManager.MeshCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
        Adds new device to this mesh.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - id of device to add
        connection - current open connection to device being added
        callback - callback to return when operation finishes
